data.eml:eml: Trachymolgus purpureus sp. n., an armored snout mite (Acari, Bdellidae) from the Ozark highlands: morphology, development, and key to Trachymolgus Berlese

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fisher, J. Ray, Skvarla, Michael J., Bauchan, Gary R., Ochoa, Ronald, Dowling, Ashley P. G. (2011): Trachymolgus purpureus sp. n., an armored snout mite (Acari, Bdellidae) from the Ozark highlands: morphology, development, and key to Trachymolgus Berlese. ZooKeys 125: 1-34, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.125.1875, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.125.1875
